revised_title: Dr. Papin's New Water-Engine: A Proposed Improvement by W. Tenon
tldr: W. Tenon presents an alternative design for Dr. Papin's water engine, suggesting a modification to the existing design that utilizes a cylindrical vessel, pipes, and bladders to create a perpetual pumping motion. The improved water engine would continuously pump water into the inner vessel and force air out through pipes, creating a steady stream of water.
